function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Close proximity increases the likelihood of disease transmission, especially in shared dwellings and apartment housing.","category":"Health Behaviors and Compliance","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of surface transmission within apartment buildings due to high-touch surfaces and communal spaces.","category":"Health Behaviors and Compliance","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of access to private balconies in housing for the elderly in high-rise residential buildings","category":"Access to infrastructure  ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of outdoor green spaces in urban apartment buildings","category":"Access to infrastructure  ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncontrolled socialization on balconies","category":"Social and Psychological Effects ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unequal access to daylight, nature, and thermal comfort due to socioeconomic status","category":"Vulnerability risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased time spent in the bedroom not sleeping, but engaging in activities like watching movies or using social media, which can be problematic for resident well-being.","category":"Mental and Emotional Wellbeing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exterior city noise pollution in apartment housing as a source of annoyance that prevents restful sleep.","category":"Mental and Emotional Wellbeing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor mental health due to lack of physical activity and social interactions","category":"Mental and Emotional Wellbeing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unclear optimal light levels for each room can lead to dissatisfaction with lighting conditions, impacting resident well-being.","category":"Mental and Emotional Wellbeing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proximity to other balconies and shared outdoor spaces can increase the risk of disease transmission between residents.","category":"Health Behaviors and Compliance","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Crowded shared spaces such as lobbies, elevators, and laundry rooms can facilitate the spread of contagious diseases among residents.","category":"Health Behaviors and Compliance","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Social isolation and distancing leading to psychological and physical health impacts for residents.","category":"Social and Psychological Effects ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of variability and variety in lighting levels based on new uses of the home.","category":"Mental and Emotional Wellbeing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High-density urban housing does not offer restorative experiences for residents","category":"Cultural and Lifestyle Risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Public ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Concentration of people in healthcare building","category":"Health Behaviors and Compliance","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of information sharing and collaboration
